uientry.unicode: This tutorial is for beginners to Total War. It teaches the basics of moving and combat on the battlefield.
This tutorial is for intermediate players. It explores battlefield combat in more detail, including group formations and special abilities.
This tutorial is for those experienced in Total War. It explores the new battlefield features exclusive to Total War: Shogun 2
This tutorial is for those experienced in Total War. It explores the new naval features exclusive to Total War: Shogun 2
This tutorial is for beginners to Total War. It will teach the basics of naval warfare, such as sailing and combat.
This tutorial takes you through a short campaign game. It also includes the beginner naval and battle tutorials.

state.unicode: For the duration of each of the battle tutorials all keyboard settings will be reset to their defaults.
